Name: Puzzles for smart: Horses
About the game: Puzzles for smart: Horses is a fairly simple, educational game. Assemble a puzzle of horses from individual fragments of the picture. Playing puzzles will seem very exciting to your child, as he will gradually achieve what he wants to see more quickly. This will take the child's attention for a long time, and you will be pleased to watch his actions. This educational game will allow you to spend time with your baby. For fans of popular puzzles of different complexity. From simple puzzles with images of horses to complex ones. For any age and level of play. In this section, selected puzzles with horses. Colorful coloring of horses. Collect a puzzle with the image of these beautiful horses. Key features of the game: - The game has 12 levels of difficulty - There are 12 different images of horses in the game - Unlimited puzzle time - Suitable for all ages - Achievements!
